name: Dragon Soul
overview: 1 Player Arcade Shoot em up, Fly the Dragon over the lands of Kof, Shoot everything you see, Shoot Eggs for Power ups, But be careful at the Maze of Vines, Touch the Vines and you Lose a Life, Good Luck and have Fun. Made with help from the Shoot 'Em' Up Construction Kit by Sensible Software and Using a modified SEUCK Enhancement Framework code, The music was done by Andrew Fisher.
